item.description:
I'm back to normal hours now (get off work at 4:30pm) so I'm going back to starting at 6:30. The weather right now says Sunny with a high of 78, so it should be good for a walk.

We'll start at Copley, go down Beacon St until we hit Cleveland Circle. This is 4.09 miles according to Google maps.

Let's meet in Copley Square, by the plaque on the rock that's circled in the pic for this meetup. I'll either be standing there or sitting nearby at the benches.

Here's the map.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll post my cell # in the comments and email the day before the walk.
item.name: Copley to Cleveland Circle, via Beacon St. (4mi.)
